title: Print entire GraphExecutor state.
body_html:
Currently it is hard to debug how a graph executor runs because some state is hard to print. We should add functionality to print all of this on request

  1. The original, unoptimized, graph
  2. The autograd fallback graph
  3. Every specialized graph created.
  4. The derivative graphs, for each graph that has a derivative.

Each graph may recursively include subgraphs with their own graph executors. When printing the graphs above we should also recursively print any subexecutors such as those that have been created by the insertion of GraphExecutor subblocks using CreateAutodiffSubgraphs.

body:
Currently it is hard to debug how a graph executor runs because some state is hard to print. We should  add functionality to print all of this on request

1. The original, unoptimized, graph
2. The autograd fallback graph
3. Every specialized graph created.
4. The derivative graphs, for each graph that has a derivative.

Each graph may recursively include subgraphs with their own graph executors. When printing the graphs above we should also recursively print any subexecutors such as those that have been created by the insertion of GraphExecutor subblocks using CreateAutodiffSubgraphs.
